snippet: His resignation came a week after he texted people stating that his cellphone had been stolen and apologizing for messages they may have received from his number.
abstract: Indiana House Majority Leader Jud McMillin of Brookville abruptly resigns, one week after he apologized to a number of people for offensive text messages they may have received from his cellphone, which he claims was stolen before the messages were sent.
lead_paragraph: His resignation came a week after he texted people stating that his cellphone had been stolen and apologizing for messages they may have received from his number.

headline.main: Indiana: Jud McMillin, Ranking Republican, Quits House
